name: Dan's Odyssey
description:
Dan's odyssey is an arcade like arena top down shooter.
you fight shapes in a futuristic setting with the objective
of completing the boss fights, upgrading your stats and
beating the high score

key features:

- satisfying gunplay and movement

- ability to slow down time or deploy your turret for a helping hand

- unlock upgrades points to upgrade
your deployable turret weapon and health

- classic arcade style beat the high score
- great sound track
